name: Project 1
title: Project Title
description: Brief 1-2 sentence overview of the project highlighting key technologies and accomplishments.
fullDescription: A detailed paragraph (3-5 sentences) describing the project's purpose, functionality, and significance. Include information about the problem it solves and its unique features.
features: Architecture or design choice you made
Problem you solved or optimization you achieved
challenges: Technical challenge 1 that was faced during development
Technical challenge 2 related to data or performance
solutions: Solution implemented for challenge 1 with technical details
Solution implemented for challenge 2 with approach taken
Solution implemented for challenge 3 with results
results: A paragraph summarizing the quantifiable impact and outcomes of the project. Include metrics like performance improvements, user adoption, or business impact.
